R

removeBlocksFromGrid() - Method in class trapomino.Tetromino
This method temporarily removes the blocks from the Grid for Grid checking purposes.
render(Graphics) - Static method in class trapomino.Credits
This method renders the background of the frame, the Credits Image, and the button to return to the MainMenu.
render(Graphics) - Method in class trapomino.Entity
This method updates the Position of the Entity based on it's velocities, then renders the Entity on the frame.
render(Graphics) - Method in class trapomino.Grid
This method renders the Grid and the blocks it contains onto the frame.
render(Graphics) - Static method in class trapomino.HighScores
This method renders the background of the frame, the buttons to return to the MainMenu, the scoreboard, and the recorded scores.
render(Graphics) - Method in class trapomino.InfiniteGame
This method is called by Trapomino, it renders the background, grid, UI, and pause button.
render(Graphics) - Static method in class trapomino.InfiniteMenu
This method renders the background of the frame and the buttons to return to the MainMenu, go to HighScores, and play InfiniteGame.
render(Graphics) - Static method in class trapomino.Instructions
This method renders the background of the frame, the Instructions Image, and the button to return to the MainMenu.
render(Graphics) - Static method in class trapomino.MainMenu
This method renders the background of the frame and all of the buttons on the MainMenu.
render(Graphics) - Static method in class trapomino.Options
This method renders the background of the frame, the Options buttons, and the button to return to the MainMenu.
render(Graphics) - Method in class trapomino.StoryGame
This method is called by Trapomino, it renders the background, grid, UI, and pause button.
render(Graphics) - Method in class trapomino.Tetromino
This method renders the Tetromino's sprite on the frame.
render(Graphics) - Method in class trapomino.TitleScreen
This method waits 200 ticks while rendering the Cognitive Thought Media Logo, then waits another 200 ticks while the developer credits are shown.
rotate() - Method in class trapomino.Tetromino
This method rotates the Tetromino's Positions in the grid based on which orientation it has.
rowCheck(int) - Method in class trapomino.Grid
This method checks if a row has been completely filled with shapes and returns true if it is filled.
run() - Method in class trapomino.Credits
This method first changes the music, then checks to see if the user has clicked the button to return to the MainMenu, if that is the case, it plays a sound and changes the frame to the MainMenu.
run() - Method in class trapomino.HighScores
This method checks to see if the user has clicked the button to change to return to the InfiniteMenu, if that is the case, it plays a sound and changes the state to the InfiniteMenu.
run() - Method in class trapomino.InfiniteGame
This method manages the movement in the grid as long as the game is not paused.
run() - Method in class trapomino.InfiniteMenu
This method checks to see if the user has clicked the button to change to another state, if that is the case, it plays a sound and changes the frame to the corresponding state.
run() - Method in class trapomino.Instructions
This method checks to see if the user has clicked the button to return to the MainMenu, if that is the case, it plays a sound and changes the frame to the MainMenu.
run() - Method in class trapomino.MainMenu
This method checks to see if the user has clicked any of the buttons on MainMenu, if that is the case, it plays a sound and changes to the corresponding frame.
run() - Method in class trapomino.Options
This method checks to see if the user has clicked the button to return to the MainMenu, if that is the case, it changes the frame to the MainMenu.
run() - Method in class trapomino.StoryGame
This method manages the movement in the grid as long as the game is not paused.
run() - Method in class trapomino.TitleScreen
This method sets the music of the game to the file named "menu_music.wav".
run() - Method in class trapomino.Trapomino
This method manages the tick system to make sure that calculations and processes are synchronized with the program's clock.
